name: Kosmovalse
description:
During the trip through the unknown space your spaceship car skidded, crashed and burst into flames. Happily getting out from the burning car you found yourself alone with the truculent creatures of the asteroids nature waiting you to suffocate out of oxygen. How long will you be able to survive?

Use WASD + Mouse, Right and Left keys.

Reasons to take a look on this game:
 - here you will be able to walk smoothly over the curvy generated surface of the asteroids as well as fly between them using the jetpack
 - enemies are fun to score
 - particle system for the blood and dust is kinda beautiful
Thanks for playing!
